00045 // Numonyx P30 Command set
00046 #define P30_READ_ARRAY               0x00FF
00047 #define P30_READ_ID                  0x0090
00048 #define P30_BUFFERED_PROGRAM         0x00E8
00049 #define P30_BUFFERED_PROGRAM_CONFIRM 0x00D0
00050 #define P30_BLOCK_LOCK_SETUP         0x0060
00051 #define P30_BLOCK_UNLOCK             0x00D0
00052 #define P30_BLOCK_ERASE_SETUP        0x0020
00053 #define P30_BLOCK_ERASE_CONFIRM      0x00D0
00054 #define P30_READ_CFI                 0x0098
00055 #define P30_READ_STATUS              0x0070
00056 #define P30_CLEAR_STATUS             0x0050
00057   
00058   
00059 /* Status Register Values */
00060 #define P30_STAT_BLOCK_LOCKED         0x0002
00061 #define P30_STAT_PROGRAM_SUSPENDED    0x0004
00062 #define P30_STAT_VPP_LOW              0x0008
00063 #define P30_STAT_PROGRAM_ERROR        0x0010
00064 #define P30_STAT_ERASE_ERROR          0x0020
00065 #define P30_STAT_ERASE_SUSPENDED      0x0040
00066 #define P30_STAT_STATUS_READY         0x0080
00067 
00068 /* P30 Flash parameters */  
00069 #define TOTAL_NUMBLOCKS        0x102
00070 #define MAIN_BLOCK_NUMBYTES    0x20000         /* 64 K-Word block size */
00071 #define PARM_BLOCK_NUMBYTES    0x8000          /* 16 K-Word block size */
00072 
00073 #define TOP_PARTITION_BASE     0xFF0000        /* address */
00074 #define BOTTOM_PARTITION_BASE  0x0000          /* address */
00075 
00076 #define TOP_BLOCK_LOWER        0xFF
00077 #define TOP_BLOCK_UPPER        0x102
00078 
00079 #define BOTTOM_BLOCK_LOWER     0x0
00080 #define BOTTOM_BLOCK_UPPER     0x3
00081 
00082 
00083 #define TOTAL_SIZE            0x2000000
00084 #define BLOCK_MASK            0xFFFF
00085 
00086 #define PRINT_POINTS          1
00087 
00088 /* A3818 reg. address */
00089 #define A3818_BPI_FLASH_AD              (0x20)  // R/W - BPI_FLASH TEST
00090 #define A3818_BPI_FLASH_DT              (0x24)  // R/W
00091 #define A3818_BPI_FLASH_CMD             (0x28)  // R/W
00092 #define A3818_DMISCCS                   (0x08)  // Device Miscellaneous Control Status
00093 #       define  A3818_DMISCCS_SPI_BPI_FLASH_SEL (1 << 4) //  BPI/SPI FLASH access select (default 0 = SPI FLASH)
00094 
00095 
00096 #define mIsStatusReady(A) ( ( A & P30_STAT_STATUS_READY ) == P30_STAT_STATUS_READY )
